short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamlines your Cardsphere experience by highlighting updates each time you visit the send page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Full release of Cardsphere update, a Cardsphere enhancement Chrome extension.

See new and updated packages each time you visit the Cardsphere send page.

To get started, open the extension on www.cardsphere.com/send with your desired package settings and hit save. Now each time you load the send page, new packages will be highlighted. The OK button updates your saved packages with new ones after review.

Also, you adjust settings at chrome://extensions under this extension's settings. There are a number of features to customize your experience and extend functionality.

Please feel free to contact me at akgdeveopment@gmail.com, Sneet1 @ reddit, or sneetzo @ discord with any thoughts, bugs, or to yell at me.
